text: Somewhere in a quiet town... a little bookstore.
Negative Takemoto: "...!"
Tachibana: "Hey! Isn't that Negative Takemoto?!"
You: "You know him? Damn, he’s good-looking."
Tachibana: "Right? I told you."
Negative Takemoto: "..."
You: "Whoa?! The vibe just turned super heavy! Why?!"
Tachibana: "Impressive, huh… he totally lives up to the name."
You: "Seriously? He's hot though…"
Negative Takemoto: "...Nice to meet you."
You: "...Nice to meet you too."
Valley Girl A: "OMG, babe! Look at him!"
Valley Girl B: "Daaaamn, he’s fine… is he coming over?!"
Valley Girl A: "Excuse meee~"
Valley Girl B: "Ugh, the vibe is DEAD heavy!"
Valley Girls: "..."
Valley Girls: "Okay byeeee~"
You: "He didn’t even speak and they already sensed the gloom..."
Tachibana: "How heavy can the air get…"
You: "Guess I gotta show ‘em how it’s done."
Tachibana: "What are you planning?"
You: "Heyyy ladies~!"
You: "Both of you, go out with me!"
Tachibana: "Okay, calm down Mr. Greedy..."
Valley Girl A: "Ew... cringe overload."
Valley Girl B: "Boy, not a chance in hell."
Valley Girl F: "Do you even hear what you're saying, like seriously?!"
Valley Girl W: "Mirror check, freak! Who even are you?!"
Valley Girl W: "I’ll eat you ALIVE!"
You: "Wait—there’s more of them?!"
You: "Also that one’s scary!!"
You: "Heh… must be blushing."
Tachibana: "Yeah right, as if."
Negative Takemoto: "..."
Negative Takemoto: "You..."
Negative Takemoto: "You’re not even that good-looking..."
Negative Takemoto: "So why are you so positive...?"
You: "Are you trying to start something?!"
Negative Takemoto: "Nah… just curious."
You: "What’s with this guy? He’s not even that negative!"
Tachibana: "Right? That’s what I keep saying."
Tachibana: "He knows he’s good-looking, so he seriously wonders..."
Tachibana: "Like, why are there people who are less attractive and still positive?"
Negative Takemoto: "If I were you, I’d have offed myself instantly."
Negative Takemoto: "Right when I was born, even."
You: "Isn’t he kinda the worst person here...?"
Tachibana: "Yeah. What’s wild is—he means every word."
Tachibana: "In elementary school he did his book report on: 'Why are most people uglier than me yet still so cheerful?'"
You: "That’s… early signs of madness."
You: "Also that’s not even a book report!"
Negative Takemoto: "I’m thinking of majoring in this in college."
You: "In WHAT?!"
You: "That’s not a real academic field!"
Tachibana: "See you later!"
You: "What a WILD character..."
Tachibana: "But he’s a good guy deep down. He’s got great taste too."
You: "Now that I think about it, why’d you drag me to the bookstore anyway?"
Tachibana: "I dunno. Bookstores are fun to wander through, y’know?"
You: "That’s true."
Tachibana: "Just like good books, you met some good people, right? Like Shizuku-chan and Takemoto."
Tachibana: "There’s still so many of my friends—and Chibi’s friends—you haven’t even met yet."
Tachibana: "I’ll introduce you, so you can have fun too."
You: "Thanks."
Tachibana: "Keep up the abstinence too, okay!"
Tachibana: "Now let’s go home."
The Negative Takemoto event will also be featured in Zephyr House.
